--- title: "In Class Exercise 12" author: "Bao Jie Yeo" date: '2024-11-11' date-modified: '2024-11-11' execute: eval: true echo: true freeze: true --- ## Loading Packages ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} pacman::p_load(sf, spdep, GWmodel, SpatialML, tmap, rsample, yardstick, tidyverse, knitr, kableExtra, spatialRF) ``` ::: ## Data Preparation ### Importing RDS File ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} mdata <- read_rds("data/rds/mdata.rds") ``` ::: ### Data Sampling ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} set.seed(1234) HDB_sample <- mdata %>% sample_n(1500) ``` ::: ### Checking for Overlaps ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} overlapping_points <- HDB_sample %>% mutate(overlap = lengths(st_equals(., .)) > 1) summary(overlapping_points$overlap) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Mode FALSE TRUE logical 1047 453 ``` ::: ::: ### Spatial Jitter ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} HDB_sample <- HDB_sample %>% st_jitter(amount = 1) ``` ::: ## Data Sampling ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} set.seed(1234) resale_split <- initial_split(HDB_sample, prop = 6.67/10,) train_data <- training(resale_split) test_data <- testing(resale_split) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} write_rds(train_data, "data/rds/train_data.rds") write_rds(test_data, "data/rds/test_data.rds") ``` ::: ### Multicollinearity Check ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} mdata_nogeo <- mdata %>% st_drop_geometry() ggstatsplot::ggcorrmat(mdata_nogeo[, 2:17]) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](ICE12_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=1152} ::: ::: ## Building Non-Spatial Multiple Linear Regression ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} price_mlr <- lm(resale_price ~ floor_area_sqm + storey_order + remaining_lease_mths + PROX_CBD + PROX_ELDERLYCARE + PROX_HAWKER + PROX_MRT + PROX_PARK + PROX_MALL + PROX_SUPERMARKET + WITHIN_350M_KINDERGARTEN + WITHIN_350M_CHILDCARE + WITHIN_350M_BUS + WITHIN_1KM_PRISCH, data=train_data) olsrr::ols_regress(price_mlr) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Model Summary -------------------------------------------------------------------------- R 0.862 RMSE 60813.316 R-Squared 0.742 MSE 3754578098.252 Adj. R-Squared 0.739 Coef. Var 14.255 Pred R-Squared 0.734 AIC 24901.005 MAE 45987.256 SBC 24979.529 -------------------------------------------------------------------------- RMSE: Root Mean Square Error MSE: Mean Square Error MAE: Mean Absolute Error AIC: Akaike Information Criteria SBC: Schwarz Bayesian Criteria ANOVA ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Sum of Squares DF Mean Square F Sig. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Regression 1.065708e+13 14 761220078101.236 202.745 0.0000 Residual 3.698259e+12 985 3754578098.252 Total 1.435534e+13 999 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Parameter Estimates ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ model Beta Std. Error Std. Beta t Sig lower upper ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ (Intercept) 115703.696 34303.409 3.373 0.001 48387.533 183019.860 floor_area_sqm 2778.618 292.262 0.165 9.507 0.000 2205.089 3352.146 storey_order 12698.165 1070.950 0.211 11.857 0.000 10596.559 14799.771 remaining_lease_mths 350.252 14.596 0.450 23.997 0.000 321.610 378.894 PROX_CBD -16225.588 630.092 -0.572 -25.751 0.000 -17462.065 -14989.110 PROX_ELDERLYCARE -11330.930 3220.845 -0.061 -3.518 0.000 -17651.436 -5010.423 PROX_HAWKER -19964.070 4021.046 -0.087 -4.965 0.000 -27854.872 -12073.268 PROX_MRT -39652.516 5412.288 -0.130 -7.326 0.000 -50273.456 -29031.577 PROX_PARK -15878.322 4609.199 -0.061 -3.445 0.001 -24923.300 -6833.344 PROX_MALL -15910.922 6438.111 -0.048 -2.471 0.014 -28544.911 -3276.933 PROX_SUPERMARKET -18928.514 13304.965 -0.025 -1.423 0.155 -45037.848 7180.821 WITHIN_350M_KINDERGARTEN 9309.735 2024.293 0.079 4.599 0.000 5337.313 13282.157 WITHIN_350M_CHILDCARE -1619.514 1180.948 -0.026 -1.371 0.171 -3936.977 697.948 WITHIN_350M_BUS -447.695 738.715 -0.011 -0.606 0.545 -1897.331 1001.940 WITHIN_1KM_PRISCH -10698.012 1543.511 -0.138 -6.931 0.000 -13726.960 -7669.065 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ``` ::: ::: ### Multicollinearity Check with VIF ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} vif <- performance::check_collinearity(price_mlr) kable(vif, caption = "Variance Inflation Factor (VIF) Results") %>% kable_styling(font_size = 18) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}

is not in your data frame :/ ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](ICE12_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ## Predictive Modelling with `gwr` ### Computing bw ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} gwr_bw_train_ad <- bw.gwr(resale_price ~ floor_area_sqm + storey_order + remaining_lease_mths + PROX_CBD + PROX_ELDERLYCARE + PROX_HAWKER + PROX_MRT + PROX_PARK + PROX_MALL + PROX_SUPERMARKET + WITHIN_350M_KINDERGARTEN + WITHIN_350M_CHILDCARE + WITHIN_350M_BUS + WITHIN_1KM_PRISCH, data=train_data, approach="CV", kernel="gaussian", adaptive=TRUE, longlat=FALSE) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Adaptive bandwidth: 625 CV score: 3.459022e+12 Adaptive bandwidth: 394 CV score: 3.231824e+12 Adaptive bandwidth: 250 CV score: 2.914787e+12 Adaptive bandwidth: 162 CV score: 2.610975e+12 Adaptive bandwidth: 107 CV score: 2.240102e+12 Adaptive bandwidth: 73 CV score: 1.971693e+12 Adaptive bandwidth: 52 CV score: 1.797415e+12 Adaptive bandwidth: 39 CV score: 1.659617e+12 Adaptive bandwidth: 31 CV score: 1.573855e+12 Adaptive bandwidth: 26 CV score: 1.550365e+12 Adaptive bandwidth: 23 CV score: 1.543003e+12 Adaptive bandwidth: 21 CV score: 1.520091e+12 Adaptive bandwidth: 19 CV score: 1.516242e+12 Adaptive bandwidth: 19 CV score: 1.516242e+12 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} gwr_bw_train_ad ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 19 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} write_rds(gwr_bw_train_ad, "data/model/gwr_bw_train_ad.rds") ``` ::: ### Model Calibration ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} gwr_ad <- gwr.basic(formula = resale_price ~ floor_area_sqm + storey_order + remaining_lease_mths + PROX_CBD + PROX_ELDERLYCARE + PROX_HAWKER + PROX_MRT + PROX_PARK + PROX_MALL + PROX_SUPERMARKET + WITHIN_350M_KINDERGARTEN + WITHIN_350M_CHILDCARE + WITHIN_350M_BUS + WITHIN_1KM_PRISCH, data=train_data, bw=20, kernel = 'gaussian', adaptive=TRUE, longlat = FALSE) ``` ::: ### Model output ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} gwr_ad ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` *********************************************************************** * Package GWmodel * AICc (GWR book, Fotheringham, et al. 2002, p. 61, eq 2.33): 24082.29 AIC (GWR book, Fotheringham, et al. 2002,GWR p. 96, eq. 4.22): 23420.43 BIC (GWR book, Fotheringham, et al. 2002,GWR p. 61, eq. at: 2024-11-23 00:50:54.314809 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ::: ### Computing Test Data bw ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} gwr_bw_test_ad <- bw.gwr(resale_price ~ floor_area_sqm + storey_order + remaining_lease_mths + PROX_CBD + PROX_ELDERLYCARE + PROX_HAWKER + PROX_MRT + PROX_PARK + PROX_MALL + PROX_SUPERMARKET + WITHIN_350M_KINDERGARTEN + WITHIN_350M_CHILDCARE + WITHIN_350M_BUS + WITHIN_1KM_PRISCH, data=test_data, approach="CV", kernel="gaussian", adaptive=TRUE, longlat=FALSE) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} write_rds(gwr_bw_test_ad, "data/model/gwr_bw_test_ad.rds") ``` ::: ### Predicting with Test Data ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} gwr_pred <- gwr.predict(formula = resale_price ~ floor_area_sqm + storey_order + remaining_lease_mths + PROX_CBD + PROX_ELDERLYCARE + PROX_HAWKER + PROX_MRT + PROX_PARK + PROX_MALL + PROX_SUPERMARKET + WITHIN_350M_KINDERGARTEN + WITHIN_350M_CHILDCARE + WITHIN_350M_BUS + WITHIN_1KM_PRISCH, data=train_data, predictdata = test_data, bw=20, kernel = 'gaussian', adaptive=TRUE, longlat = FALSE) ``` ::: ### Saving Predicted Values ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} gwr_pred_df <-as.data.frame( gwr_pred$SDF$prediction) %>% rename(gwr_pred = "gwr_pred$SDF$prediction") ``` ::: ## Predictive Modelling with RF ### Data Preparation ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} coords <- st_coordinates(HDB_sample) coords_train <- st_coordinates(train_data) coords_test <- st_coordinates(test_data) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} train_data_nogeom <- train_data %>% st_drop_geometry() ``` ::: ### Calibrating RF Model ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} set.seed(1234) rf <- ranger(resale_price ~ floor_area_sqm + storey_order + remaining_lease_mths + PROX_CBD + PROX_ELDERLYCARE + PROX_HAWKER + PROX_MRT + PROX_PARK + PROX_MALL + PROX_SUPERMARKET + WITHIN_350M_KINDERGARTEN + WITHIN_350M_CHILDCARE + WITHIN_350M_BUS + WITHIN_1KM_PRISCH, data=train_data_nogeom) ``` ::: ### Model Output ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} rf ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Ranger result Call: ranger(resale_price ~ floor_area_sqm + storey_order + remaining_lease_mths + PROX_CBD + PROX_ELDERLYCARE + PROX_HAWKER + PROX_MRT + PROX_PARK + PROX_MALL + PROX_SUPERMARKET + WITHIN_350M_KINDERGARTEN + WITHIN_350M_CHILDCARE + WITHIN_350M_BUS + WITHIN_1KM_PRISCH, data = train_data_nogeom) Type: Regression Number of trees: 500 Sample size: 1000 Number of independent variables: 14 Mtry: 3 Target node size: 5 Variable importance mode: none Splitrule: variance OOB prediction error (MSE): 2289284270 R squared (OOB): 0.8406868 ``` ::: ::: ### Preparing Test Data ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} test_data_nogeom <- cbind( test_data, coords_test) %>% st_drop_geometry() ``` ::: ### Predicting with RF ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} rf_pred <- predict(rf, data = test_data_nogeom) ``` ::: ### Saving Predicted Values ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} rf_pred_df <- as.data.frame(rf_pred$predictions) %>% rename(rf_pred = "rf_pred$predictions") ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} grf_ad <- grf(resale_price ~ floor_area_sqm + storey_order + remaining_lease_mths + PROX_CBD + PROX_ELDERLYCARE + PROX_HAWKER + PROX_MRT + PROX_PARK + PROX_MALL + PROX_SUPERMARKET + WITHIN_350M_KINDERGARTEN + WITHIN_350M_CHILDCARE + WITHIN_350M_BUS + WITHIN_1KM_PRISCH, dframe = train_data_nogeom, bw=20, kernel="adaptive", coords=coords_train) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Number of Observations: 1000 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Number of Independent Variables: 14 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Kernel: Adaptive Neightbours: 20 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` --------------- Global ML Model Summary --------------- ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output PROX_SUPERMARKET + WITHIN_350M_KINDERGARTEN + WITHIN_350M_CHILDCARE + WITHIN_350M_BUS + WITHIN_1KM_PRISCH, data = train_data_nogeom, num.trees = 500, mtry = 4, importance = "impurity", num.threads = NULL) Type: Regression Number of trees: 500 Sample size: 1000 Number of independent variables: 14 Mtry: 4 Target node size: 5 Variable importance mode: impurity Splitrule: variance OOB prediction error (MSE): 2086962998 R squared (OOB): 0.8547665 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Importance: ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` floor_area_sqm storey_order Calculation time (in seconds): 29.4448 ``` ::: ::: ### Predicting with Test Data ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} grf_pred <- predict.grf(grf_ad, test_data_nogeom, x.var.name="X", y.var.name="Y", local.w=1, global.w=0) ``` ::: ### Saving Predicted Values ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} grf_pred_df <- as.data.frame(grf_pred) ``` ::: ## Model Comparison ### Combine Model Outputs ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} test_data_pred <- test_data %>% select(resale_price) %>% cbind(gwr_pred_df) %>% cbind(rf_pred_df) %>% cbind(grf_pred_df) ``` ::: ### Transposing Data ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} test_longer <- test_data_pred %>% st_drop_geometry() %>% pivot_longer(cols = ends_with("pred"), names_to = "model", values_to = "predicted") ``` ::: ### Renaming ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} model_labels <- c( gwr_pred = "gwr", rf_pred = "Random Forest", grf_pred = "gwRF") test_longer <- test_longer %>% mutate(model = recode( model, !!!model_labels)) ``` ::: ### Computing RMSE ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} rmse_results <- test_longer %>% group_by(model) %>% rmse(truth = resale_price, estimate = predicted) %>% rename(rmse = .estimate) %>% select(model, rmse) ``` ::: ## Model Comparison Visualization ### Bar Chart ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggplot(rmse_results, aes(x = reorder(model, rmse), y = rmse, fill = "skyblue")) + geom_bar(stat = "identity", fill = "skyblue", color = "black", width = 0.7) + labs(title = "RMSE Comparison of Models", y = "RMSE", x = "Model") + theme_minimal() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](ICE12_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-35-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ### Scatter Plots ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} test_longer <- test_longer %>% left_join(rmse_results, by = "model") ggplot(data = test_longer, aes(x = predicted, y = resale_price)) + facet_wrap(~ model) + geom_point() + geom_text(data = test_longer, aes(x = Inf, y = Inf, label = paste("RMSE:", round(rmse, 2))), hjust = 1.1, vjust = 1.1, color = "black", size = 4) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](ICE12_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-36-1.png){width=1344} ::: ::: ### Variable Importance **Preparing Output** ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} var_imp <- data.frame( Variable = names(grf_ad$Global.Model$variable.importance), Importance = grf_ad$Global.Model$variable.importance ) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggplot(var_imp, aes(x = reorder(Variable, Importance), y = Importance)) + geom_bar(stat = "identity", fill = "skyblue") + coord_flip() + labs( title = "Variable Importance from Ranger Model", x = "Variables", y = "Importance" ) + theme_minimal() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](ICE12_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-38-1.png){width=672} ::: :::
